casebody.data:
2002-1566 (La. 10/25/02)

TOWN OF MAMOU v. Gerald FONTENOT, et ux. No. 2002-C-1566. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Mamou Town of; — Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Evangeline, 13th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 59970; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-1622.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ. VICTORY, J., would grant the writ.
